alert.note: Alert for Athens; Meigs; Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:31PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Meigs, southwestern Washington, southeastern Athens, north central Mason, northwestern Jackson and southwestern Wood Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 231 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Racine, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belpre, Pomeroy, Racine, Coolville, Forked Run State Park, Ravenswood, New Haven, Mason, Washington, Tuppers Plains, Lubeck, Chester, Syracuse, Hartford City, Portland, Belleville, Reedsville, Little Hocking, Darwin and Blennerhassett. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 147 and 156. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
